message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DL 

The paper discusses the impact of language on international relations and the rejection of papers due to overstatement or understatement of findings, indicating a focus on natural language processing and communication. The use of a corpus of sentence-level revisions from academic writing suggests a focus on computational linguistics (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DL) techniques for analyzing and understanding statement strength. The mention of insights gained from annotation efforts also suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR) techniques for analyzing and organizing the corpus.
